metadata.name: ΛLIEͶΛTION
metadata.description:
2304 x 2238 px  |  .mp4

Originally made on Polaroïd film with chemicals, isopropanol, fluorescent ink, holographic foil, heat/cold & pressure at measured times. The green/blue part was shot under a blue UltraViolet light.

This series is about unexisting places, shaped by our own interpretations. A cartography of emotions which only exist in our deep thoughts.
Using the pareidolia psychological phenomenon, we try to perceive familiar shapes and patterns.
A short moment where past, present and future are reunited together to create new meanings.
